original: intros Hloc Hcont. apply Derive_ext_loc. apply Hloc. intros x Hball. pose proof (is_derive_RInt f (RInt f a) a x) as Hderive. apply Hderive. - exists (mkposreal _ Hball). intros y Hy. apply RInt_correct. eapply ex_RInt_Reals_1. eapply ex_RInt_Reals_0 in Hloc. apply Hloc. - apply Hcont.
